word:
(496)  R-324-'07              Sanitarium Calif., Elder Reaser                  Oct. 3, 1907. 257 S. Hill St., Los Angeles, Calif. 

My Brother:- 
     I have read your letters, but cannot possibly answer them fully now. You would misunderstand me if I should write. If I attend the Los Angeles meeting, I can then communicate to you and to others. I have much to say. Until then make no decided move.
